tlabenchmarks

Welcome to TLA+ Benchmarks

The page TLA+ Benchmarks is a library of TLA+ specifications for distributed algorithms. The webpage supplies the TLA+ community with:

  • A comprehensive library of the TLA+ specifications that are available today, in order to provide an overview of how to specify an algorithm in TLA+.
  • A comprehensive list of references and other interesting information for each problem.

We encourage the submission of new challenging TLA+ benchmarks.

List of benchmarks

5 acp-nb-wrong Wrong version of non-blocking atomic commitment with a reliable broadcast clean crashes AC1-AC5, termination, AllAbort, AllCommit default theories
